articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: A startup called Germ becomes the first private messenger that launches directly from Bluesky's app - TechCrunch
articles.description: Social network Bluesky now offers private messaging by integrating the startup Germ's E2E encrypted messenger natively in its app.
articles.content: Here’s something that you’ve never seen on Big Tech social platforms: The decentralized open social network Bluesky has integrated new technology from a startup called Germ Network in order to bring … [+5410 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Record scratch—Google’s Lyria 3 AI music model is coming to Gemini today - Ars Technica
articles.description: With a simple prompt, you can generate 30 seconds of something like music.
